thoughts.text: I think I should execute the 'execute_shell' command to install the ping utility and then check my internet connection to troubleshoot any issues that may be preventing me from browsing the website.

By executing a shell command to install the 'ping' utility and then checking my internet connection, I can troubleshoot any issues that may be preventing me from browsing the website.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'execute_shell' command to execute a shell command to install the 'ping' utility.
- Check the output of the command to ensure that the utility was installed successfully.
- Use the 'execute_shell' command to execute a shell command to check my internet connection using the 'ping' utility.

thoughts.criticism: I should have checked if the 'ping' utility was installed before attempting to use it to check my internet connection. I need to remember to check for required utilities before executing commands that rely on them.
thoughts.speak: I think I should execute a shell command to install the 'ping' utility and then check my internet connection to troubleshoot any issues that may be preventing me from browsing the website.

args.command_line: sudo apt-get install -y iputils-ping && ping -c 5 google.com
